data.message: "I'm gon' let the world know that PROOF is hot/I should cut his mic off when the music start/ready to snap on a dumb-ass fan/every time I hear "dude, I love your band!"/We ain't a band bitch we don't play instruments/so why he get 90 and we only get 10 percent/and the guys acting funny every area code/"proof carry my bag" bitch carry your own/cant make it to the stage security in my way/"who the fuck are you where obe and dre?" 😉 R.I.P Big Proof
